name: sap-sipper
effect: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.
short_effect: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Boosts Attack when hit by
a Grass-type move.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
Boosts Attack when hit by
a Grass-type move.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Boosts the Attack stat when hit
by a Grass-type move.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
Boosts the Attack stat when hit
by a Grass-type move.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move,
instead of taking damage.

Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move,
instead of taking damage.

Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move
instead of taking damage.

Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move
instead of taking damage.
flavor_text_entries.scarlet-violet: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Grass-type moves. Instead, its Attack stat is boosted.
